name: Dig Craft - Idle Miner Master
description:
How many epic treasures you can find? Explore each world and discover all of them!

Features:

* Simple & fun digging game.
* 4 types of drill machines.
* Hundreds of epic treasures.
* 5 maps of world.
* Free to play.

How to play
Tap left or right of the screen to control the drill machine. Get as much as treasure before running out of the oil.

For any help please contact us via,
